articles.content: NEW DELHI: Helped by buying by FIIs for six consecutive days despite a rate hike by the US Fed, Nifty is hovering around the 18,000 level. While global macro headwinds are troubling investors, the qu… [+2252 chars]

articles.author: Amit Sharma
articles.title: Tata Nexon Regains Top Spot; Beats Brezza & Creta In Oct 2022 Sales - India Car News
articles.description: The Tata Nexon has been one of the best-selling SUVs of the country. However, the new Maruti Brezza had reached the top spot in August and September 2022 sales. The Nexon has regained its top spot in the list of top selling SUVs in the month of October 2022. …

articles.title: Royal Enfield Records 60% Growth; Hunter In Great Demand - India Car News
articles.description: In October 2022, Royal Enfield managed to sell 82,235 units against 44,133 units of the same duration last year. The company registered a sales growth of 60%, thanks to the festive season. The export numbers stood at 5,707 units as opposed to 3,522 units in O…
